org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.recipient

Class RekReceipient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.recipient.BasePKRecipient
      • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.recipient.RekReceipient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recipient

    public class RekReceipient
extends BasePKRecipient
    PublicKey Receipient used for public keys not associated with any certificate or SignedData. Should be used with caution.

    See section 5.3.5 in IEEE 1609.2
